item.description: link flowchart LR A --o B B --x C D o--o E E <--> F F x--x G shapes graph LR id1[方框] id2(帶有圓角的方框) id3([體育場形狀]) id4[[子例程]] id5[(圓柱狀)] id6((圓形)) id7>非對稱形狀] id8{菱形} id9{{六角形}} id10[/平行四邊形1/] id11[\平行四邊形 2\] id12[/梯形 1\] id13[\梯形 2/] id14(((雙圓))) subgraphs flowchart TD c1-->a2 subgraph one a1-->a2 end subgraph "`**two**`" b1-->b2 end subgraph three c1-->c2 end sequence sequenceDiagram participant Alice participant Bob Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you? loop Healthcheck John->John: Fight against hypochondria end Note right of John: Rational thoughts <br/>prevail.
